amendment.description: To authorize additional appropriations for historically black colleges and universities and to decrease the cost-sharing requirement relating to the additional appropriations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 137 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 137 proposed by Senator Landrieu for Senator Lieberman. (consideration: CR S1417-1418; text: CR S1417) To authorize additional appropriations for historically black colleges and universities and to decrease the cost-sharing requirement relating to the additional appropriations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 137 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 137 proposed by Senator Landrieu for Senator Lieberman.
